feature_model.name: Tutoring
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Tutoring (f_Tutoring) :m IntelligentTutoring (f_IntelligentTutoring) :m Feedback (f_Feedback) :m Advice (f_Advice) :o Tutoring lecture (f_Tutoring_lecture) :o Grading (f_Grading) :o User Authentication (f_User_Authentication) :o Result Monitoring (f_Result_Monitoring) :g [1, *] : Student (f_Student) : Instructor (f_Instructor) :g [1, *] : Tutoring exercise (f_Tutoring_exercise) : tutoring simulation (f_tutoring_simulation)
